name: MULE DEER FOUNDATION
sampleDescriptions: support renewal of Wildlife and Hunting Heritage Conservation Council (FACA); support stewardship contracts for mule deer habitat at USFS; support S1417 Sage grouse mule deer habitat restoration act.
